articles.description: For a sustained upmove, the index has to close above 16,750, where its 200-day exponential moving average is placed. If the index manages to go past the level, a target of 17,100 can be expected, Mazhar Mohammad of Chartviewindia said.
articles.content:
The Nifty gained more than 100 points on June 2 despite weakness in its Asian counterparts, with IT, metal, pharma stocks and index heavyweight Reliance Industries leading the rally.

articles.author: ETtech
articles.title: India's digital payments market will triple to $10 trillion by 2026: PhonePe-BCG study - Economic Times
articles.description: According to the PhonePe-BCG study, UPI has supercharged Indias transition to non-cash payments, especially in person-to-person (P2P) fund transfers and low-value merchant (P2M) payments.
articles.content:
Bengaluru: Indias digital payment market is expected to more than triple to $10 trillion by 2026, according to the latest study by digital payments firm PhonePe and Consulting Group (BCG).
